scripts.check-master: branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && [ $branch = master ] || (echo 'Error: New release can only be published on master branch' && exit 1)
scripts.dev: yarn clean && tsc && yarn copy-files && tsc --watch
scripts.pub: cd dist && npm publish --tag latest && cd ..
scripts.release:major: yarn check-master && yarn version --major && yarn build && yarn pub && yarn push
scripts.release:minor: yarn check-master && yarn version --minor && yarn build && yarn pub && yarn push
scripts.release:patch: yarn check-master && yarn version --patch && yarn build && yarn pub && yarn push
